definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: At the moment, very quiet night, the eighth floor rooftop terrace is a kiosk hospital.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，夜很静，八楼的楼顶，阳台就是一小亭院。

sentences.english: Long streamers hung from the tops of tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 长幅标语从高高的楼顶上垂挂下来。

sentences.english: They swung huge car advertisements from the top of the tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 他们从高楼顶上向下悬挂了巨大的汽车广告。

sentences.english: The biggest rooftoppers' community is in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 最大的楼顶摄影者社区在俄国。

sentences.english: The owners of a building on Times Square held that first party on top of their building.
sentences.chinese: 时代广场的楼房业主在楼顶上举行了第一次派对。

sentences.english: There I am on top of the ten-story building again, chaussure louboutin, and I fall.
sentences.chinese: 我照旧在一座十层高的楼顶上，从上里摔下来。

sentences.english: The students were whisked up to the top floor in the lift.
sentences.chinese: 电梯很快把学生们带到了楼顶。

sentences.english: The flag on the building was split by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 楼顶上的旗子被大风撕破了。

sentences.english: A minaret lays crumbled on the rooftop of the local mosque.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰式的尖塔倒塌在清真寺的楼顶。

sentences.english: Materials are elevated to the top floor by the new hoist.
sentences.chinese: 材料由那台新起重机吊到楼顶。

sentences.english: What's stopping people the world-over from having green roofs?
sentences.chinese: 是什么阻止世界各地的人们建设楼顶花园呢？

sentences.english: In the bare room under the roof, there was a small, battered valise on his BED.
sentences.chinese: 在楼顶下面空房间的床上，放着一只破旧的小旅行包。

sentences.english: In national astronomical observatory doctor under the Cui Chenzhou's suggestion, everybody mounts the roof.
sentences.chinese: 在国家天文台博士崔辰州的建议下，大家登上楼顶。

sentences.english: The roofs are covered with grey tiles, in this way;
sentences.chinese: 楼顶覆以火烧青瓦盖，经久不损。

sentences.english: There I am on top of the ten-story building again, and I fall.
sentences.chinese: 我还是在一座十层高的楼顶上，从上面摔下来。

sentences.english: Ther are seascape bar on our roof, you could enjoy the sunset on sea with a beer.
sentences.chinese: 我们楼顶有海景吧，可以欣赏美丽的三亚湾海上落日。

definition: top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴 in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗/Tiantai county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
top floor/the top of a building
